boardgame.name: Meeple Circus
미플 서커스
boardgame.description: Let the show begin!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;You have only one goal in Meeple Circus: Entertain the audience. The competition is tough, but you can create the most amazing circus by proposing incredible acts! Acrobats, horses, and many accessories are at your disposal. Be sure to undertake a good rehearsal, then with your remarkable dexterity, you can give them the show of their lifetime. Once the circus music starts, all eyes will be upon you!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In short, Meeple Circus is a dexterity game in which you do what all gamers do when setting up a game: Pile up your meeples!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2017 Golden Geek Best Family Board Game Nominee
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: 41. Devon Dice: Happy Essen After Podcast
43. DDP The best Games of 2017 (In our opinion)
BGP 025 : One Year Anniversary of Board Games with Panda
Episode 4 - Duelosaur Island _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Showdown between Reef, Azul, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Azul Stained Glass
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Meeple Circus: The Wild Animal _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Aerial Show
